title: Sign In - Entitled Account
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have a MLB.tv entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN users log into MLB.tv
AND users navigate to a live game
custom_expected: THEN users should be able to access the MLB.tv feed

title: Sign In - Non-Entitled Account
custom_preconds: GIVEN users don't have an MLB.tv entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN users log into MLB.com
AND users try to access a live feed
custom_expected:
THEN users should be blocked from accessing the feed
AND users should see an error message display on the top of the page, error message:

"Unable to launch the requested content. Please refresh your page.
If your problems persist please:
Clear your browser cookie for this page and relaunch the MLB.TV Media Player.
Select another live or archived game and try again."

title: Video Playback - Play/Pause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps:
WHEN users tap on the pause button
AND the user resumes playback with the play button
custom_expected:
THEN users should see the live feed pause
AND users should see the live feed resume playback

title: Video Playback - Jog Back 10 Seconds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the rewind 10 seconds
custom_expected: THEN users will see the video playback rewind 10 seconds

title: Video Playback - Volume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps:
WHEN users click the Mute Volume Button
AND users click on the Volume Button
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video playback muted
AND users will see the video playback at max volume

title: Video Playback - Strikezone
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the strikezone button
custom_expected: THEN users will see the strike zone widget display

title: Video Playback - Broadcast
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps:
WHEN users click the broadcast button
AND users select a different Video Feed
AND users select a different Audio Overlay
AND users select a different Audio Only feed
custom_expected:
THEN users should see the list of the different broadcast avaliable (Video Feeds, Audio Overlay, Audio Only)
AND users should see video playback at the same place with the selected video feed
AND users should see video playback at the same place with the selected audio overlay
AND users will be sent to the audio only player.

title: Video Playback - Stats
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the Stats button on the top right
custom_expected: THEN users will see the stats widget displaying properly

title: Video Playback - Full Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the full screen button
AND users click on the minimize button OR users hit the esc button on their keyboard
custom_expected:
THEN users views the video playback in fullscreen
AND users views the video playback in a smaller screen

title: Video Playback - Live Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the Live button
custom_expected: THEN the video player will scrub to the most live point of the feed

title: Video Settings - Playback Quality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the settings button
AND users selects a different playback option
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the different playback options
AND users will see the video start playback in the same place with the playback option selected.

title: Video Settings - Close Captioning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to a live feed
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the settings button
AND users click on the closed captioning button
AND users click on the closed captioning button again
custom_expected:
THEN users will see an on off radio button next to Closed Captioning
AND users will see the video play with Closed Captioning
AND users will see the video play without Closed Captioning

custom_preconds: GIVEN users have a MLB.tv entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN users log into MLB.tv
AND users navigate to an archived game
custom_expected: THEN users should be able to access the MLB.tv feed

title: Video Playback - Seek
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users have an active MLB.tv account
AND users have navigated to an archived feed
custom_steps: WHEN users click on any point in the video
custom_expected: THEN users should see the video playback fast forward or rewind (depending on where the user seeks on the player).

title: Sign In - Entitled Account
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have an entitled MiLB.tv Account
custom_steps:
WHEN users navigate to a live feed
AND users sign in with an entitled MILB.tv Account
custom_expected: THEN users will be able to access the video

title: Sign In - Non Entitled Account
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have a non-entitled MiLB.tv Account
custom_steps:
WHEN users navigate to a live video feed
AND users click watch
custom_expected:
THEN users should see a popup display with an error message and a button to purchase MiLB.tv, error message: 
"You need to be a MiLB.TV subscriber to watch this game"

title: Video Playback - Flash Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MiLB.tv entitled account
AND the user has logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN users select a live video feed
AND users click accept
OR users click deny
custom_expected:
THEN users will see a popup requesting access to use Flash Player
AND users will be able to view the video
OR the users will be blocked from viewing the video

title: Video Playback - Play/Pause Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MiLB.tv entitled account
AND the user has logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN users click play
AND users click pause
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video start playing
AND users will see the video paused

title: Video Playback - Volume Controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MiLB.tv entitled account
AND the user has logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the audio button
AND users clicks on the audio button again
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video playback volume muted
AND users will see the video playback volume maxed out.

title: Video Playback - Full screen button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an MiLB.tv entitled account
AND the user has logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN users clicks on the full screen button
AND users clicks on the full screen button again OR users hit the esc button on their keyboard
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video play on fullscreen
AND users will see the video return to the smaller screen size.

title: Preroll Advertisement
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN users click play
custom_expected: THEN the video should start with a pre-roll advertisement.

title: Preroll Advertisement - Volume Control
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MLB.com.
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the volume button on the bottom right
AND users click on the volume button on the bottom right
custom_expected:
THEN users should see the ad muted
AND the users should see the ad playback at Max Volume

title: Preroll Advertisement - Next Video
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MLB.com
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on a new video on the video player page
OR users lets the next video automatically play
custom_expected: THEN the video should start with a pre-roll advertisement.

title: Video Playback - Play/Pause Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MLB.com.
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the pause button
AND users click on the play button
custom_expected:
THEN users will see video pause playback
AND users will see the video resume playback

title: Video Playback - Volume Control
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MLB.com.
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the volume button
AND users click on the volume button again
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the player continue playback muted
AND users will see the player continue playback at max volume

title: Video Playback - Full Screen Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MLB.com.
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the full screen button
AND users click on the minimize button OR users hit the esc button on their keyboard
custom_expected:
THEN users will see playback continue in a full screen player
AND users will see the playback continue in the original screen size.

title: Video Playback - Rewind Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MLB.com.
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the rewind button (to the left of the play button)
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video rewind to the beginning in the state the player was in before the button was pressed, i.e:
Video will rewind in a paused state if the player is paused.

title: Preroll Advertisement
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MiLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN users click play
custom_expected: THEN the video should start with a pre-roll advertisement.

title: Preroll Advertisement - Volume Control
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MiLB.com
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the volume button on the bottom right
AND users click on the volume button on the bottom right
custom_expected:
THEN users should see the ad muted
AND the users should see the ad playback at Max Volume

title: Preroll Advertisement - Next Video
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MiLB.com
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on a new video on the video player page
OR users lets the next video automatically play
custom_expected: THEN the video should start with a pre-roll advertisement.

title: Video Playback - Play/Pause Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MiLB.com
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the pause button
AND users click on the play button
custom_expected:
THEN users will see video pause playback
AND users will see the video resume playback

title: Video Playback - Volume Control
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MiLB.com
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the volume button
AND users click on the volume button again
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the player continue playback muted
AND users will see the player continue playback at max volume

title: Video Playback - Full Screen Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MiLB.com
custom_steps:
WHEN users click on the full screen button
AND users click on the minimize button OR users hit the esc button on their keyboard
custom_expected:
THEN users will see playback continue in a full screen player
AND users will see the playback continue in the original screen size.

title: Video Playback - Rewind Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN users have navigate to a video player page on MiLB.com
custom_steps: WHEN users click on the rewind button (to the left of the play button)
custom_expected:
THEN users will see the video rewind to the beginning in the state the player was in before the button was pressed, i.e:
Video will rewind in a paused state if the player is paused.

title: Unified Player - Poster Image
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
AND the video isn't on autoplay
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the play button
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see a poster image load with a play button in the middle
AND the user should see video playback.

title: Unified Player - Autoplay
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls down to the video
AND the user scrolls away from the video
custom_expected:
THEN the video should have playback
AND the video should stop playing.

title: Unified Player - Play button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
AND the user has already paused the video
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks play
custom_expected: THEN the video should resume.

title: Unified Player - Pause button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
AND the user has clicked play on the video OR the video started playing
AND the video isn't displaying the preroll ad.
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the pause button
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the video pause.

title: Unified Player - Forward 5 seconds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
AND the user has clicked play on the video OR the video started playing
AND the video isn't displaying the preroll ad.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has more than 5 seconds left in the video
AND the user clicks the Fast Forward button
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the video skip forward for 5 seconds.

title: Unified Player - Rewind 5 Seconds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
AND the user has clicked play on the video OR the video started playing
AND the video isn't displaying the preroll ad.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has let the video run for more than 5 seconds
AND the user clicks the rewind 5 seconds button
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the video rewind 5 seconds

title: Unified Player - Volume Control
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
AND the user has clicked play on the video OR the video started playing
AND the video isn't displaying the preroll ad.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user lowers the volume
OR the user raises the volume
OR the user mutes the video
AND the user unmutes the video
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the video's volume lowered
AND the user should see the video's volume raised
AND the user should see the volume mute
AND the user should see the volume unmuted.

title: Unified Player - Leave Behind
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
AND the user has clicked play on the video OR the video started playing
AND the video isn't displaying the preroll ad.
custom_steps: WHEN the user lets the video finish
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the video play the next video in the playlist
AND the volume controls should retain.

title: Unified Player - Preroll
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness
AND the user has clicked play on the video OR the video started playing
custom_steps:
WHEN the user sees the preroll ad start
AND the user sees the mute/unmute button
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be unable to skip the pre roll ad
AND the user can mute/unmute the ad.

title: Unified Player - Homebase Compatability
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the test harness OR a video player page that is pulling data from HomeBase
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Play
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see a pre roll ad
AND the user should see video playback
AND the data under the video should be correctly populated.
